description:
In this crafting tutorial, you will learn how to craft an Ice Devil Miniature. To craft this custom miniature, I used XPS-foam, PVA-glue, toothpicks, acrylic paints, plastic trash, 2 lentils, and cardstock.
Follow Bard's Craft: https://www.instagram.com/bardscraft/ https://www.facebook.com/Bards-Craft-2323914130952339/
title: Crafting the Ice Devil Miniature for D&D (Custom Miniature Crafting Tutorial)
